titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the apprehending and punishing all stragling souldiers, for the greater security of His Majesties good subjects.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our court at Oxford, this first of December, in the nineteenth yeare of Our reigne. 1643.
Arms 37; Steele notation: Souldiers are Nineteenth.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
